events.message: I recently bought a jacket from your website but it doesn't fit at all. I would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The issue has been categorized as Refund based on the customer's request for money back due to sizing problems.
The case was assigned to customer service representative Emma to handle the refund request efficiently.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I understand you'd like to request a refund for your jacket order.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the jacket has been used or damaged in any way?
My order number is 8745362. The jacket is brand new and has not been worn outside. No damage or defects.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate your refund process immediately and send you a prepaid shipping label for the return.
Great, I appreciate the quick response and the return label will make things easier. Looking forward to the refund.
The refund process is now active, and the return label has been emailed to you. Your case is being resolved promptly.
Just checking in to confirm that you received your refund after returning the jacket. Let us know if you need further assistance.
We are closing this case now since the refund has been successfully processed and the customer confirmed receipt.
